thread.title: Claire Howarth
thread.title_full: Great British Meat Co. reviewed by Claire Howarth

author: Claire Howarth
title: Claire Howarth
text: I've had a few orders from the Great British Meat Company now, and I can't fault them. The order arrives promptly and in well packed in a polystyrene box with plenty of ice packs to keep the meat cool and fresh. The meat itself is just lovely - far better than supermarket produce, and of a similar price, if not cheaper. I had previously ordered from other online companies, and while this is slightly more expensive, the quality is far superior and, in my opinion, worth it . The beef in particular is amazing. I'm basing my review on loads of chicken (new year health kick) and the monthly saver boxes, of which I've had two. These are, frankly, a bargain and last me at least two months. There's lots of tempting deals that come through on email too! Thoroughly recommended.
